ygData.subject: RE: Dragoon Dirk
ygData.msgSnippet: It is because he doesn t always drop it anymore.  My enchanter friend and my warrior were lucky - we got one each on the first two times we killed Dvinn. On
ygData.messageBody:
It is because he doesn't always drop it anymore. My enchanter friend and my
warrior were lucky - we got one each on the first two times we killed Dvinn.
On the way out of the Crushbone a level 21 ranger asked for our assistance
in killing Dvinn for his heart (the ranger didn't know about the dirk).
Well after killing Dvinn a total of 7 times that night we never saw another
Dirk. We tried again later to help our wizard get one and after killing
Dvinn 9 times (over a two night period) we finally got one. So they are
becoming more rare.


> ----------
> From: grei@...[SMTP:grei@...]
> Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 4:50 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Dragoon Dirk
>
> From: <grei@...>
>
> > > Personally I feel the Dirk is sold for WAY under it true value,
> > > considering the WB Rapier sells for 225 plat.
> >
> > More that the well balanced is horrifically overpriced. Try selling one
> > back to a vendor for a more realistic idea of it's true value. Everyone
> > I know who has bought a well balanced weapon regrets it and tells anyone
> > who will listen not to make the same mistake.
>
> The prices on Dirks are going up anyway. Last night I couldn't find
> anyone willing to sell a Dirk for less than 60pp--and I went straight to
> the source too. Everyone blamed it on the LORE flag. Go figure.
>
> Grei
> Bristlebane
>
